data.title: Learn more about our Cloud Adoption Services
data.meta_description: Migrate to the cloud or optimize your existing cloud solution with the help of Naturaily's cloud experts.
data.text:
Each cloud service provider has its consultants, but they can only advise you on how to move your infrastructure to their cloud.

If you’re looking for a comprehensive cloud solutions review - make use of our 12+ years’ experience in the digital industry. We can set up a call to discuss all the details and come up with the plan of your company's cloud transition.

Services

Cloud Migration

Moving IT infrastructure to the cloud is much more than just "lift-and-shift". It has to be a part of a bigger strategy if your company wants to seize all the opportunities offered by cloud solutions.

Our cloud experts are here to advise you on choosing the best-fitting solutions, as well as plan and conduct cloud implementation.

With the cloud, your company can:

reduce time-to-market,

optimize IT asset usage,

improve the flexibility of IT infrastructure,

achieve high performance and scalability,

reduce IT overhead costs,

take advantage of Big Data and Machine Learning services.

How does the cloud migration process work?

Our cloud engineers will analyze your current on-premise infrastructure, then choose the proper cloud components, plan the migration, create any additional tools necessary to migrate the data and, finally, execute a smooth transition to the cloud.

Services

Post-migration support

Migration to the cloud is a means, not a goal. This is why all the things happening after cloud migration are vital for successful digital transformation. When your cloud migration is complete, we offer maintenance services to ensure the stability and security of all your data.

When your cloud migration is complete, we offer maintenance services to ensure the stability and security of all your data. We operate based on a Service Level Agreement (SLA). Our DevOps team can be available in different time variants and offer various response times - all to help you get the best of your cloud solutions.

Services

Cloud Optimization

When you have already migrated your assets to the cloud, its optimization is essential to achieving business efficiency.

What we can help you with is selecting and assigning the right resources to your business’ workloads. When the ongoing needs of the app are dynamically matched to the cloud supply, it runs smoother, requires less infrastructure support and delivers maximum value.

We will identify and correct all inefficiencies, as well as make sure that your cloud is not only optimized, but also suitably protected.
